type push_obj = {

navigation ML object

type push_arg =
| PStr of string
| PObj of push_obj

type 'a next =
| NUnit
| NFalse
| NRoute of push_obj
| NError of Mjs.error Mjs.t
| NFunction of 'a Mjs.t -> unit
